title: Boris Johnson – 2020 Twitter Comments on Winston Churchill Statue
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the Twitter comments made by Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, on 12 June 2020.
content:
The statue of Winston Churchill in Parliament Square is a permanent reminder of his achievement in saving this country – and the whole of Europe – from a fascist and racist tyranny.
